resources.string: Enjoy nature at its best, Oxbow lake will make you wish you never leave the place
Oasis Spa will expose you to all the beautiful things you never know your body needed
Want to wash your car? why not relax and be entertained at the same time, Bolex is got you covered
Buy everything you ever need or don\'t need, Market square is got everything, You can get lost in this mall
Whit ever strong waves from the ocean Brass Beach resort is the best place to be for ocean lovers.
Eat till you cant eat no more
The best place to eat anything your heart desires, any type of snack you want, foreign or local you will find it in chicken republic
You dont know what sweet food taste like till you eat at djakes, the best food anywhere, both foreign and local foods available.
For the best value for money chop chop kitchen is got you covered, eating the best food does not have to mean you must spend all you money, spend less for more at chop chop.
No time wasting coffee drive is got all your coffee needs and serves the best coffee you will ever find in Bayelsa.
Feeling like getting a snack? Shawama spot is the place to be, believe me a snack from shawama spot will change your life
At Aridolf Hotel your comfort is guaranteed, a 5 stare hotel at the heart of bayelsa, whith the best of everything.
Never lack confort when Ayalla can provide all the confort you need, with the best beack fron view in bayelsa ayalla suites has the most breath taking sites ever.
The largest hotel in all of bayelsa in terms of size and space, you will never feel crowded or lack packing space Brass suites is situated in the largest part of the city and covers too much space.
Think Style, and luxury think Ayoks
Are you an art person or you just like style and beautiful things, Ayoks hotel is the most stylish hotel in bayelsa and its an art work on its own.
If you need the most secure and cryptic hotel ever... Shaga Motel is got you covered.. It is located inside a military base and offers the best security and comfort ever.
Police head quarters in Bayelsa, Stay safe and call the cops
The bay elsa state fire dept will put out any fire even hell fire.
Just a few places we thing you should visit or at least know about just incase you are feeling avdentures and would like to experience Bayelsa from the inside out. LOL
